keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Arrive at Marineford with Level 6 Prisoners
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates arrive at Marineford, revealing their newly recruited members from Impel Down Level 6, including Sanjuan Wolf, Catarina Devon, Avalo Pizarro, and Vasco Shot.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a major power increase for the Blackbeard Pirates, as they now include some of history's most dangerous criminals.

notes: The crew expanded significantly with the recruitment of Level 6 prisoners, forming the Ten Titanic Captains structure.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Pirates Vow to Protect Luffy
keyMoments.description: Following Ace's death, the Whitebeard Pirates, led by Marco, vow to protect Luffy and help him escape from Marineford, honoring Ace's final wish.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's commitment to family bonds even after Ace's death, and establishes the debt Luffy owes to Whitebeard's crew.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Separated from His Crew
keyMoments.description: After defeating Akainu, Whitebeard's earthquake attack splits Marineford in two, separating him from his crew and leaving him isolated.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Whitebeard's final stand and confrontation with Blackbeard, as he is now alone and vulnerable.

statusHistory.reason: Continuing to fight after Ace's death

goals: Protect Luffy and help him escape
notes: The crew faces its darkest hour after losing Ace, but remains committed to protecting Luffy.
